name: Till the End (tom.p10)
description:
Title: Till the End

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: ETarget 

Market: No ages 

Game Overview: By and large, the goal is to reach the final island. This is complicated by obstacles. But who sees the big picture can find a faster, but also more difficult path. 

Instructions: Movement is done by WASD and the space tab to jump. you could also use the arrow keys but it's  more difficult. 

Game Design Team

Tom Protzek – Game Designer
